title: Under the Clear Starry Sky
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>Alright, all done. Take a look, Kotori-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Okay. Thanks, Kanan-san.... W-, wooow~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Fufu, how do you like the view from here?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>It’s amazing! I can’t believe I can see these many stars! There are so many that I can’t even recognize any constellations~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahaha! It’s easier to tell once you identify the landmark stars.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Ah, I see, right. I got ahead of myself because there were just so many. Ahaha.... Ah-choo!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Are you cold? Let’s see.... There should be.... Here you go, a blanket!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Thank you, Kanan-san. You came prepared, huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>I do this a lot, after all~. I also got some warm drinks♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Hey, Kanan-san, let’s put on the blanket and watch the stars together.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Don’t worry, I’m used to the cold. Go ahead and use it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>....But, since we’re here, I thought I should learn how to stargaze properly from you.... May I?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Geez, there’s no winning against you, Kotori-chan~. Sure, I’ll teach you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
